title: Why font on nameplate of TreVeyon Henderson’s jersey looks small
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots The font on Henderson's nameplate has been one of the biggest mysteries in the NFL so far this season.
Many have noticed the font of TreVeyon Henderson's name on his jersey is relatively small.

title: ‘No Kings’ protest in Boston: What protesters said and why they showed up
